### Project Summary

The Canadian Coast Guard uses a site in Beauharnois for buoy tending operations. A concrete hovercraft ramp was built in 2017. Due to safety concerns related to CCG operations, the ministry wishes to extend the length of the existing reinforced concrete slab-on-grade by approximately 15 meters.

### Period of Contract

Work will be carried out from contract award to December 31, 2023, at the latest.

### Conditional Set-Aside

This is an open tender, however, it will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received by Indigenous businesses who are certified under the PSIB criteria and who may be listed in the Government of Canada’s Indigenous Business Directory.
